abstract: Preview of NFC wild-card playoff game between Detroit Lions and Dallas Cowboys.
lead_paragraph: DeMarco Murray and the stellar Dallas offensive line will get a true test by going against Detroit’s brick wall of a front seven led by Ndamukong Suh.
snippet: DeMarco Murray and the stellar Dallas offensive line will get a true test by going against Detroit’s brick wall of a front seven led by Ndamukong Suh.

headline.main: N.F.C. Wild-Card Matchup: Detroit Lions at Dallas Cowboys
